name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry the guanciale in a pan until crispy.
Mix egg yolks and Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Combine pasta, guanciale, and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A rich and hearty meat sauce.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Sauté onion, garlic, carrot, and celery in olive oil until softened.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Add tomato sauce and simmer for 20 minutes.
Combine pasta and sauce.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

name: Penne Arrabbiata
description: A spicy tomato sauce with penne pasta.
instructions: Cook the penne in salted boiling water until al dente.
Sauté garlic and red chili flakes in olive oil until fragrant.
Add tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Combine pasta and sauce.
Garnish with parsley and serve.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: A creamy white sauce with fettuccine pasta.
instructions: Cook the fettuccine in salted boiling water until al dente.
Melt butter in a pan and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add heavy cream and simmer for 5 minutes.
Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted.
Combine pasta and sauce.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

name: Lasagna
description: Layered pasta with meat and cheese.
instructions: Cook the lasagna noodles in salted boiling water until al dente.
Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until softened.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Add tomato sauce and simmer for 20 minutes.
Mix ricotta cheese, egg, and Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Layer noodles, meat sauce, ricotta mixture, and mozzarella cheese in a baking dish.
Bake at 375°F for 30 minutes until bubbly and golden.
Let cool for 10 minutes and serve.

name: Pesto Pasta
description: Pasta with a fresh basil pesto sauce.
instructions: Cook the pasta in salted boiling water until al dente.
Blend basil, pine nuts, Parmesan cheese, garlic, and olive oil in a food processor until smooth.
Combine pasta and pesto sauce.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

name: Macaroni and Cheese
description: A creamy and cheesy pasta dish.
instructions: Cook the macaroni in salted boiling water until al dente.
Melt butter in a pan and stir in flour to make a roux.
Add milk and cook until thickened.
Stir in cheddar cheese until melted.
Combine pasta and cheese sauce.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

name: Ravioli with Marinara Sauce
description: Stuffed pasta with a rich tomato sauce.
instructions: Cook the ravioli in salted boiling water until al dente.
Sauté garlic and onion in olive oil until softened.
Add tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Combine pasta and sauce.
Garnish with basil and serve.

name: Linguine with Clam Sauce
description: Pasta with a savory clam sauce.
instructions: Cook the linguine in salted boiling water until al dente.
Sauté garlic in olive oil until fragrant.
Add clams and white wine and cook until clams open.
Combine pasta and clam sauce.
Garnish with parsley and serve.

name: Tortellini Alfredo
description: Cheese-filled pasta with a creamy Alfredo sauce.
instructions: Cook the tortellini in salted boiling water until al dente.
Melt butter in a pan and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add heavy cream and simmer for 5 minutes.
Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted.
Combine pasta and sauce.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Pasta with a garlic butter shrimp sauce.
instructions: Cook the linguine in salted boiling water until al dente.
Sauté garlic in olive oil until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Add butter and lemon juice and cook until melted.
Combine pasta and shrimp sauce.
Garnish with parsley and serve.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Pasta with a creamy Alfredo sauce and chicken.
instructions: Cook the fettuccine in salted boiling water until al dente.
Melt butter in a pan and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add heavy cream and simmer for 5 minutes.
Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted.
Combine pasta, chicken, and sauce.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

name: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook the penne in salted boiling water until al dente.
Sauté garlic in olive oil until fragrant.
Add zucchini, yellow squash, and bell pepper and cook until tender.
Add cherry tomatoes and cook until softened.
Combine pasta and vegetables.
Garnish with Parmesan cheese and serve.

name: Baked Ziti
description: Pasta baked with tomato sauce and cheese.
instructions: Cook the ziti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Combine ziti, tomato sauce, ricotta cheese, and half of the mozzarella cheese.
Transfer to a baking dish and top with remaining mozzarella cheese and Parmesan cheese.
Bake at 375°F for 20 minutes until bubbly and golden.
Garnish with basil and serve.

name: Stuffed Shells
description: Pasta shells stuffed with cheese and baked in tomato sauce.
instructions: Cook the pasta shells in salted boiling water until al dente.
Mix ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, egg, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Stuff each shell with the cheese mixture.
Spread a layer of tomato sauce in a baking dish and arrange stuffed shells on top.
Cover with remaining tomato sauce and bake at 375°F for 20 minutes until bubbly.
Garnish with basil and serve.
